Text: Thanks a lot, Remuxes are a perfect thing ! :)
Though you could have included subs, they take essentially no space !

Yeah I know subs take no space but I remux bluray isos for my own collection and I got OCD when it comes to unnecessary things inside the mkv container.

I dont use subtitles expect english which in that case I download elsewhere because blurays english subs are usually for hearing impaired and they suck bigtime lol, they put subtitle on car sounds and bird sounds and stuff like that.
stupid to not put xtras, going to BOZX

Ciao then.

Thanks for the clean version!
